# Waybill App
Waybill processing service (module) written with Golang.

## Requirements
- Go 1.16

```shell
go get -u github.com/ivas1ly/waybill-app
```

## Tech Stack
* Golang
  * Fiber
  * GORM
  * Gqlgen
  * Zap
  * [OTP](https://github.com/pquerna/otp/)
* PostgreSQL

## Features

* 1
* 2
